The company also provides LED products for use in professional cycles; and renewable energy products. EISO Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5315.TWO.summary: United Radiant Technology Corporation manufactures and sells liquid crystal display panels and modules. The company's panels and modules include TN, WTN, STN, WSTN, FSTN, WFSTN, and TFT. It also offers LCM products, capacitive and resistive touch panels, heat dissipations, LED lighting products, electronic shelf labels, and automotive products. The company offers its products through a network of approximately 20 distributors worldwide. United Radiant Technology Corporation was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

5321.TWO.summary: Best Friend Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs). It offers flex PCBs; and rigid PCBs, such as wireless WIFI, projector, light, and power system drive boards, as well as solar panels. The company was formerly known as Yeti Electronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Best Friend Technology Co., Ltd in June 2008. Best Friend Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1983 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5324.TWO.summary: Shihlin Development Company Limited operates in real estate development business in Taiwan. It offers land development, building planning, engineering construction, and after sales services. The company is also involved in catering, hotel, leisure, and recreation business. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5356.TWO.summary: Sirtec International Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells electronic product assemblies, and plastic injection and molding products in Taiwan. It offers communication products, including GPS receivers, broadband routers, and VO IPhones; computer peripheral products, such as laser toner cartridges, POS machines, and platform NAS; consumer products comprising LED TVs, HHDs, and Bluetooths; optoelectronic products, such as TFT-LCD drive cards, and LED light bars and lightings; automotive electronic products comprising head up displays, car video recorders, GPS models, and tire pressure detectors; and OEM products consisting of FPC processing, dispensers, blood glucose meters, and smart meters. The company also provides plastics products comprising cartridges, barcode scanners, car audio driver panels, modems, electronic assembly products, game controllers, health care and medical equipment, and electronic piano panels. In addition, it offers electronic plating, spray painting, printing, supersonic welding, and mold design and manufacturing services; and PCB assembly services. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5381.TWO.summary: Uniplus Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, processing, and trade of various printed circuit boards. The company offers laminated multilayer printed circuit boards, basic circuit boards, and copper foil base boards, as well as aluminum substrates and lubricated aluminum covers. Uniplus Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5383.TWO.summary: Kenly Precision Industrial Co., LTD. manufactures and sells precision machine tools in Taiwan. The company offers molding products, including stamping molds and insert molding molds, as well as machining of jigs, tools, and parts; and photoelectric components, such as LED open tooling product. It also provides semiconductor components comprising IC heat sinks, transistor frames, diode frames, and CU clips; and electronic components consisting of connector terminals, contacts of relays and switches, and slide of variable resistors. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5392.TWO.summary: AVY Precision Technology INC. designs, produces, and sells camera parts in Taiwan. The company offers metal parts for cameras and mobile phones; inner structure parts, including LCD frames and laser welding assemblies; and nameplate and appearance parts, such as decorative parts, stamping plates, and flash reflector covers. It also provides multi-function printers and mechanical parts of medical equipment; electronic and auto parts comprising power cord chucks, battery plugs, metal shrapnels for relay, and gold plated shrapnels; and metal stamping parts and plastic parts. In addition, the company engages in stamping, producing, and supplying micro-motors; and designing and manufacturing molds and stamping products. AVY Precision Technology INC. was founded in 1975 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5469.TW.summary: HannStar Board Corp. manufactures, fabricates, and sells print circuit boards in Taiwan. The company offers telecom, server, back plane, card, and NB products. Its products are used in computer and peripheral; cellular phones, networking equipment, and telecom systems; game consoles, set top boxes, televisions, and printers; and car control panels, automotive navigation systems, and digital products for official or entertaining services applications. The company was formerly known as Pacific Science and Technology Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HannStar Board Corp. in December 1998. HannStar Board Corp. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5487.TWO.summary: Tontek Design Technology Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells consumer electronics IC design products. The company offers multimedia series products, including TV game systems; 3C appliances series products, such as AD MCUs, LCD and LED drivers, infrared IR emissions, calculators, and energy-saving appliances; and health care series comprising R2F MCUs, indoor-outdoor thermometer, sports car meter, heart rate detection, and thermometer series. It also provides touch series, including capacitive touch MCUs and capacitive touch standard products; and green energy series, such as LED driver, PIR energy saving, PIC MICU, and PIR peripheral components. Tontek Design Technology Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5493.TWO.summary: San Lien Technology Corp. provides environment monitoring and micro vibration detection products, and system integration services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers sensor and recorder products, such as acceleration transducers, amplifiers, angle sensors, annular load cells, crackmeters, displacement transducers, inclinometer casings, load cells, network accelerometers, pressure transducers, cube visual and voice terminals, main control units, rebar strain gauges, solid load cells, spot-weldable strain gauges, strain gauges, switch boxes, tilt plates, tilt casts, tilt views, torque transducers, vibration sensors, vibration monitoring systems, weldable strain gauges, data loggers, and VW piezometers. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6088.HK.summary: FIT Hon Teng Limited engages in the design, development, production, and sale of interconnect solutions and related products in Taiwan, People's Republic of China, the United States, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. The company offers cable components, including array of IO cables assemblies, as well as wire harness and power cords. It also provides connector components comprising backplane, high speed, input/output, and power connectors, as well as memory/edge cards, sockets, terminal blocks, and wire to board/board to board connectors; and active optical cables, embedded optical modules, transceiver modules, and acoustic products. In addition, the company offers radio frequency antenna cable and module assemblies; wireless charging products and components; and accessories, such as headsets, speaker systems, and power and cable accessories. It also engages in research, development, and manufacture of batteries; manufacturing of metal processing machinery and equipment; and sale of smart home products. The company offers its products under the e Belkin, Linksys, Wemo, and Phyn brand names. It serves communications infrastructure, computers and consumer electronics, mobile and wireless devices, automotive, and industrial and medical industries. The company was formerly known as New Wing International Holdings Limited and changed its name to FIT Hon Teng Limited in June 2013. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Foxconn FIT Hon Teng Limited is a subsidiary of Foxconn (Far East) Limited.

6108.TW.summary: APCB Inc. produces and sells multi-layer PCB products for application in consumer electronic sector in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides camera module boards for use in security controls, notebooks, monitors, mobile phones, and tablets; TFT-LCD boards for LCDs, TVs, mobile phones, and backlight modules; and consumer electronic boards for use in projectors, type c modules, smart meters, mobile phones, notebooks, and games. It also offers RF module boards used in mobile phones, PCs, notebooks, and tablets; industrial control boards for PLC control panels, variable electrical appliances, electric control doors, servers, and power supply units; automotive boards for use in body control systems, dashboards, sensors boards, and head lamp; MCPCBs for LED thermal modules, LED packaging, and lighting; and memory module boards for use in SSD, USB, and moduleul. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6120.TW.summary: Darwin Precisions Corporation manufactures and sells backlight module technology in Taiwan. It provides optoelectronic products, including backlight and panel modules, NB display modules, touch module bounding, and SET machines; lighting application products, such as LED panel light, LED kitchen light, light guide plates, and application development products; and acrylic sheets, including optical grade acrylic boards, cover lens, Pika Pika, and PMMA. The company also offers precision metal stamping parts, such as backplane, frames, and covering cover; optical components consisting of LGP light guides; precision injection products, such as TV appearance, plastic front frame/back cover, and plastic frame; precision molds; and electronic paper applications. Its products are used in LCD TVs, personal monitors, notebook computers, and automotive displays. The company was formerly known as Forhouse Corporation and changed its name to Darwin Precisions Corporation in 2015. Darwin Precisions Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6124.TWO.summary: Yeh-Chiang Technology Corp. produces and sells electronic components and materials worldwide. It operates through Heat Pipe, Lighting, and Semiconductor segments. The company's thermal components include heat pipes, vapor chambers, and loop heat pipes. Its electronic materials comprise BGA solder sphere, solder paste, and SMT and semiconductor flux products. The company also engages in the production and sale of raw alcohol, lighting equipment, semiconductor packaging wires, and solder balls; manufacture and sale of bioethanol; international trade activities; and environmental protection related business, as well as offers LED products. It serves original equipment manufacturers of computing systems and electronic devices; semiconductor companies; manufacturers using SMT processes; manufacturers requiring thermal solutions; thermal module design and manufacturing companies; and system houses that require cooling technologies. Yeh-Chiang Technology Corp. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6126.TWO.summary: Singatron Enterprise Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and supplies electrical connectors for laptop industries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers waterproof connectors, such as circular, quick lock, M5/M8, M12, USB, USB charger, RJ45, cable gland, NMEA 2000, and LEV connectors; and consumer connectors, including DC power jack, audio jack, USB2.0/USB3.0, USB3.1 Type-C, RJ/transformer, HDMI, battery, and other connectors. The company also provides professional support services. Its products are used in consumer electronics, portable devices, networking, marine electronics, outdoor displays, outdoor lighting, and communications for outdoor solutions, as well as industrial automation and light electronic vehicles. Singatron Enterprise Co.,Ltd was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6141.TW.summary: Plotech Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCB's) in Taiwan and China. It offers PCB's of various layers for applications, such as automotive, telecommunication, Bluetooth, LCD displays, storage, connectors, scanners, industrial PC's, medical equipment, computers, wireless, power supply, dram modules, probe cards, load boards, burn-in board power supply, GPS, wireless, research and development prototypes, digital cameras and video, IA products, PDAs, cellular phones, etc. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6153.TW.summary: Career Technology (Mfg.) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flexible printed circuits in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides single-sided, double-sided, double access, and multilayer flex circuits; air gap structures; and rigid-flex boards, as well as component assemblies. Its products are used in various applications, such as mobile phones, touch panels, tablet PCs, cameras, flat displays, notebooks, GPS, autotronics, ultrabooks, wearable devices, and virtual reality, as well as in medical instrument market segments. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6156.TWO.summary: Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells magnetic components, printed circuit boards, and wire products. Its magnetic components include coils, line filters, power chokes, and transformers primarily used in the production of transformers, filters, and inductors, as well as in adapter, LED TV, LCD TV, charger, game console, desktop, monitor, printer, lighting, and communication applications. The company's printed circuit boards are used in consumable electronic products, power supplies, machinery, instruments, and automobile industries, as well as other industries. It also offers wire products for LED TV and display, car audio, battery, power supply equipment, and home appliances. The company was formerly known as K-Bridge Electronics Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. in March 2011. Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6167.TWO.summary: Powertip Technology Corporation manufactures and sells small to mid-size full color TFT and monochrome displays, and touch panels worldwide. The company's offers embedded solutions, full viewing angle displays, EM touch products, TFT displays, TFT with projected capacitive touch panels, graphic and chip-on-glass LCD modules, character LCD modules, FS-LCDs, VATN/PBT LCD modules, resistive and capacitive touch panels, and evaluation boards; and surface mount technology, chip-on-board, chip-on-flex, tape automated bonding, and screen printing products. Its products are used in white goods and gas pumps/parking meters, as well as for industrial, medical, consumer, automotive, communications, and test and measurement applications. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

6185.TWO.summary: Plastron Precision Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and market of connectors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers board to board, header/socket, USB, memory card connectors, etc.; and serial ATA products, I/O connectors, and edge card connectors. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6191.TW.summary: Global Brands Manufacture Ltd. engages in the PCB production and EMS businesses in Taiwan. The Company's printed circuit boards are used in desktop PCs, network and communication products, digital cameras, and other products. It also provides EMS services, including SMT assembly, tooling, and plastic and systems assembly. The company offers EMS for various products, including PCs; storage products, such as USB flash drives and HDDs; consumer electronics comprising TFT-LCDs; wireless communication products; gaming machines, and security and communication products; and automotive electronics. It supplies products to companies in the information, communication, automobile, and consumer electronics industries. The company was formerly known as Cyber Solutions Corporation and changed its name to Global Brands Manufacture Ltd. in 2003. Global Brands Manufacture Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6194.TWO.summary: Yufo Electronics Co., Ltd. primarily manufactures and sells printed circuit boards in Taiwan and internationally. It offers computer motherboards for use in personal computers, industrial computers, and medical equipment; and high frequency impedance control printed circuit boards for use in servers, communication base station, network communication equipment, and high-precision instruments. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6196.TW.summary: Marketech International Corp., manufactures, sells, imports, and trades in a range of integrated circuits, semiconductors, electrical and computer equipment and materials, chemicals, gas, and components. The company also engages in design and manufacturing of customized equipment; factory affair and mechatronic system, including clean room, automatic supply system of gas and chemicals, monitor system, turn-key, and hook-up project services; contracting for semiconductor automatic supply system and electrical installing construction; design, manufacturing, and installation of automatic production equipment and related parts; trading, installation, and repair of various machinery equipment and peripherals; sales of cosmetics and daily necessities and panels; and production, development, and implementation of software, as well as installation of industrial machine and equipment and consulting and coding services. In addition, it is involved in research, trading, and consulting of information system software and hardware appliances; supply of electronic information; medical consulting services; design and manufacture of RF booster; management of IoT and 5G telecommunication instrument; production of scrubber bins for semiconductor manufacturers; and design, installation, debugging, and technology services of tunnel systems. Marketech International Corp. was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6205.TW.summary: Chant Sincere Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of connectors and cables in Taiwan and internationally. The company's principal products include I/O connectors, board to board connectors, waterproof connectors, industrial connectors, automotive connectors, memory card connectors and adaptors, high-speed connectors and cables, and audio and video connectors and cables. Its products are used in various industries, such as computing, industrial and automation, telecommunication, automotive, waterproof, consumer, and medical industries. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6209.TW.summary: Kinko Optical Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells optical components and lens worldwide. The company offers digital single-lens reflex camera, 3D sensing, mobile phone, projector, NB, surveillance, IP camera, security camera, automotive, panoramic camera, Internet of Things, industrial camera, telescope, and sports camera lenses. It also provides spherical and aspherical glass lens OEM, and lens ODM services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

6210.TWO.summary: Kintech Electronics Co. Ltd. engages in manufacturing, processing, and trading of single-sided and multi-layer printed circuit boards and electronic components in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, Japan, China, and the Southeast Asia. It offers its products for consumer and other products, communication products, PC and peripheral, industrial equipment, and servers. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6213.TW.summary: ITEQ Corporation manufactures and sells copper clad laminate materials used for fabrication of printed circuit boards in Taiwan and Asia. It offers mass lamination boards, copper clad laminates, prepreg products, and electronic components. The company's products are used in various application areas, such as computational and communications applications comprising servers, storage, and switches; radio frequency and microwave devices, consisting of 5G and mmWaves; automotive applications, including advanced driver assist systems; and high density interconnect solutions, which include smartphones. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6217.TWO.summary: C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells spring loaded probes and connectors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers testing solutions, including high frequency testing, Kelvin contact testing, memory testing, burn-in testing, fine pitch connector testing, IC and ICT test probe, ATE connecting, general final testing, panel testing, wafer level testing, battery probe, and high current IC testing solutions. It also provides pogo pin connectors, such as standard and non-standard, single pogo pin, waterproof, ball point, magnetic, high current and frequency, and ultra-small pin connectors, as well as screw pins; female and industrial connectors; and DAC network cables. The company was formerly known as CCP Contact Probes Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd. in 1998. C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6224.TW.summary: Polytronics Technology Corp. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of circuit protection and thermal management devices for high-density electronics systems. It provides EVERFUSE polymeric positive temperature coefficient products, including surface-mount devices for computers, portable electronics, game consoles, telephony and broadband products, mobile phones, industrial controls, batteries, and multimedia products; radial-leaded devices for AC/DC adapters, power supply products, USB hubs and accessories, computer accessories and related applications, medical equipment, industrial controls, and automotive and motor protection products; and battery device products for mobile phones, laptops and netbooks, PDAs, portable multimedia players, MP3s, and game consoles. The company also offers telecom products for xDSL, VoIP, MDF module, Ethernet, and telecom analog and digital line card applications, as well as for modem, telephone, and facsimile machines; thermal conductive boards for automotive lighting, power module, solar cell, IC packing, and LED applications; current limiting modules for note book, cell phone, security system, and automotive applications; surface mount fuses; transient voltage suppressor diodes; thyristor surge suppressor devices; electrostatic discharge protectors; metal oxide varistors and potentiometers; gas discharge tubes; thermal setable pads; thermal dissipation coating materials; thermal conductive inks; heat dispersing materials; and overvoltage protection element and related semi-finished goods, modules, and heat conductive substrates. In addition, it engages in the investments and general business operations; and production and sale of resistors, discrete semiconductor devices, and other resistive elements. The company operates in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. Polytronics Technology Corp. was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6230.TW.summary: Nidec Chaun-Choung Technology Corporation provides thermal management products worldwide. It offers server/DT, NB/tablet, and LED modules; thermal components, including vapor chambers and heat pipes; heatsinks; and thermal systems. The company was formerly known as Chaun-Choung Technology Corp. and changed its name to Nidec Chaun-Choung Technology Corporation in January 2021. Nidec Chaun-Choung Technology Corporation was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6246.TWO.summary: Taiwan Thick-Film Ind. Corp manufactures and sells transformers, backlight modules, light emitting diode (LED) light bars, and light guide plates in Taiwan. It offers back light modules, such as in-vehicle and industrial control, tablet series, NB series, and monitors; LCM assemblies; LED light bars for consumer electronics, industrial control, medical, military, automotive, and other applications; and automotive/new energy automotive electronics that include vehicle charging station main boards, vehicle charging indicator main boards, car door lock main boards, automotive control switches, anti-pinch window lift monitor main boards, and vehicle indicator light switches. The company also provides cultural and creative business unit that provides brand licensing, product image design, cross-industry alliances and strategic alliances, creative products, 3C-related products, daily necessities, and auto supplies. Taiwan Thick-Film Ind. Corp was founded in 1982 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6269.TW.summary: Flexium Interconnect, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of flexible printed circuit (FPC) boards in Taiwan, China, rest of Asia, Europe, and America. It provides single-sided, double-sided, multilayer, and rigid-flex FPC boards. The company also manufactures build-up copper clad laminate; researches and develops, manufactures, processes, trades, and repairs build-up printed circuit boards (PCB), flexible PCB, related semi-finished goods and parts, parts for semi-finished goods of polyimide film base copper clad laminate, and molds, tools, and clamping apparatuses; and sells raw materials. Its products are used in computers, LCD screens, consumer-type electronic products and equipment, and items related to the automobile GPS screens. Flexium Interconnect, Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6272.TWO.summary: Wieson Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells interconnect components and wireless components. It offers I/O connectors, board mount connectors, card and socket connecters, connecters and cables, cable assemblies, optical fiber components, wires, wireless modules, automotive electronics, and LED lighting products, as well as antennas. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6284.TWO.summary: INPAQ Technology Co., Ltd. provides circuit protection components and antenna products for computing, communication, consumer electronics, and automotive electronics primarily in Taiwan, China, Korea, and North America. It offers RF antennas, such as patch, active, chip, dipole, NFC, RFID, and customized antennas, as well as automotive, wireless power charger, module system, and LTC technology products. The company also provides SMD metal oxide varistor, ESD, transient voltage suppressor, and multilayer varistor; chip ferrite bead and common mode filter; and power, general circuits, and high frequency inductors. Its products are used in phones, tablets, NBs, TVs, and set top boxes, as well as automotive and network applications. INPAQ Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6288.TW.summary: Excellence Optoelectronics Inc. design, development, and testing of automotive LED component packaging in Taiwan, China, United States, Germany, Spain, and internationally. The company offers LED lamps with AlInGaP and InGaN chip materials. It also provides LED street lighting, high/low bay, shoe box, wall pack, and patio light products; LED light modules; LED components for lighting; LED traffic signals, such as ball signals, arrow signals, pedestrian signals, vehicle countdown, bicycle signals, and tram way signals; and automotive light modules for ODM/OEM services. In addition, the company engages in design, manufacturing, construction, and installation of public works and lighting systems. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6289.TW.summary: Arima Optoelectronics Corp. operates in the optoelectronics market. It offers UHB LED and LD dice, and epitaxial wafer products to LED manufacturers in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6294.TWO.summary: Tekom Technologies, Inc provides tutoring services in Taiwan. It offers national examination, correspondence, double-effect, and travel teaching products and services. The company is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

6405.TW.summary: Onano Industrial Corp. provides opto-electronic glass slimming solutions in Taiwan. The company provides slimming, polishing, and film coating services for TFT-LCD, OLED, solar cell glass, etc.; PV panel slimming; anti-glare treatment; opto-electronic coating; and OGS strengthening products. Its products are used in various applications, including smart phones, tablets, ultra-thin laptops, consumer electronics, LCD displays, etc. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6432.TWO.summary: Arlitech Electronic Corp. supplies inductors for LCD panel industry in Taiwan. It offers high current power, SMD power, DIP power, and RF inductors, as well as automotive grade and EMI suppression filters. The company also provides business items; cooling materials, such as graphene papers, thermal conductivity die-casting aluminum alloy, and graphene coating; and thermal solution designs. Its products are used in the display panel, network, industrial, entertainment, storage device, and computer applications. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6442.TW.summary: EZconn Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells precision metal and optical fiber components of various electronic products in Taiwan, Asia, the United States, and Europe. The company offers RF coaxial connectors, precision adaptors, jumpers, surge arrestors, filters, amplifiers, and dipolar antennas, as well as CATV connector / components, shielding can for STB/ cable modem, microwave connector / dipole antenna, base station connector / arrester, LAB adaptor, and automotive connection system products for use in lightning protectors, antennas, filters, RF connectors, and POE home terminal AV/data MoCA filters. It also provides equipment distribution products, including OSA, passive, advanced, and other fiber optics products for access, metro-core/long haul, and transceiver applications; and ODM services. EZconn Corporation was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6449.TW.summary: Apaq Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic components in China, Taiwan, and internationally. It offers aluminum solid capacitors, aluminum liquid electrolytic capacitors, and general electronic components; and coiled and chip-type conductive polymer solid state capacitors. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6474.TWO.summary: WFE Technology Corp. manufactures and sells electrical products primarily in Taiwan. It offers power integration products; and circuit protection products, CO and outside plant products, connectors, diodes, encoders, LED shunt protectors, magnetic products, microelectronic modules, position sensors, potentiometers, resistive products, switches, transistors and thyristors, trimpot trimming potentiometers, pro audio products, and automotive products. The company also provides quartz oscillators and microchips. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6475.TWO.summary: Assem Technology Co., Ltd engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of board-to-board and flexible printed circuit board connectors in Taiwan. It also offers board to board battery and USB type C connectors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6498.TWO.summary: Powertip Image Corp engages in the manufacture of electronic components and optical instruments Taiwan and China. The company offers cellphone, NB, optical touch panel, LED illumination, and optical fiber lenses. It also provides PC and Web camera lenses. Powertip Image Corp was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

6510.TWO.long_name: Chunghwa Precision Test Tech. Co., Ltd.
6510.TWO.summary: Chunghwa Precision Test Tech. Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the testing of semiconductor components in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It also produces printed circuit boards (PCB); and markets electronic products. The company offers interposers that convert signal wiring of probe PCB and allow the probe head to receive the signal; vertical probe cards for use in test interface before wafer dicing and IC packaging; and direct docking products for use in wafer testing. It also provides load board PCBs to test yield rate after dicing, mounting, welding, and wrapped with plastics, ceramics, and metals. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6512.TWO.summary: GoMax Electronics, Inc. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of audio and video systems in Taiwan. It offers SDI, DVI, converter, audio, HDMI, display port, and wall plate series products; and live streaming, optical extender, A/V over IP, video processor, pattern generator, and tool kit products, as well as legacy products. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6560.TWO.summary: Appro Photoelectron Inc. operates as a design house for image products to enable customers to develop products in Taiwan. It offers camera module solutions, body worn cameras, and car DVR solutions; and image related products. The company also provides system integration and design, and FAE technical support services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6577.TWO.summary: Promate Solutions Corporation designs, develops, and sells technologies for TFT LCD displays worldwide. The company offers embedded panels, panel PCs, industrial displays, and LCD products. It serves medical, automotive, vending, and marine markets. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6597.TWO.summary: Ecocera Optronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramics circuit boards in Taiwan. It offers direct plating copper products consisting high-power LED thermal dissipation substrates, LED thermal dissipation modules, concentrating type solar cell substrates, passive components, high power electronic components, etc. The company also provides direct bonded copper and high performance copper products. Its products are used in LED lighting, automotive lighting, mobile phone LED flash, UV, display, and other applications. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6609.TWO.summary: Taiwan Takisawa Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision machine tools and printed circuit board drillers in Asia, Europe, the Americas, and internationally. The company offers machine tools, such as small and medium CNC lathes, and non-CNC high speed precision lathes for bicycle, motorcycle, and automobile industries, as well as parts processing plants supplying the aeronautic industry. It also provides horizontal, vertical, dual spindle, and extra heavy duty CNC lathes; high-speed precision drilling machines; and equipment sales and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Taiwan Takisawa Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Takisawa Machine Tool Co., Ltd.

6651.TWO.summary: Cystech Electronics Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, and supplies power devices for the computing, consumer electronics, communication, and industrial markets worldwide. The company offers MOSFET and SCR products, bipolar and digital transistors, and AECQ transistors. It also provides universal high brightness LED drivers; PWM integrated circuits (IC); DC to DC ICs; and dual operational amplifier and voltage references, regulators, CMos regulators, and quadruple operational comparators. In addition, the company offers switching control, fast, zener, switching, and schottky diodes; general purpose, glass passivated, snubber damping, and high efficiency rectifiers; and bridge and TVS products. Cystech Electronics Corp. is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6673.TWO.summary: Innovision FlexTech Corporation manufactures and sells projection screens. It offers ultra-short throw front projection, telephoto, and rear projection screens. The company is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. Innovision FlexTech Corporation is a subsidiary of Arisawa Mfg. Co., Ltd.

6698.TW.summary: FineMat Applied Materials Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures high-precision metal masks based on precision etching technology in Taiwan. It offers high-precision metal mask for display; flexible OLED display metal mask fabrication and Web services; OLED and semiconductor recycle and cleaning services; and products for various types of precision etching applications, as well as full-size precision frame manufacturing services. The company also provides design consulting, mask etching, frame preparation, spot welding, and cleaning and regeneration services. It offers its products for the OLED display panel industry; and products to biomedical equipment and optical lens masks. The company was formerly known as Yiqiang Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to FineMat Applied Materials Co., Ltd. in 2012. FineMat Applied Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6717.TWO.summary: SmartDisplayer Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells smart display cards in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides all-in-one cards; crypto currency cards; OATH card-type OTP tokens; and EMV display cards. It also offers IC, segmented e-paper, module, and firmware design; semiconductor and graphic e-paper integration; emulation kit; and credit card personalization services, as well as various OTP seed perso solutions. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.

6732.TWO.summary: Sensortek Technology Corp. provides a range of sensor chips. Its principal products include ambient light sensors, proximity sensors, and MEMS accelerometers that are used in various applications, such as mobile phones, smart phones, tablets, laptops, digital cameras, and consumer electronics. The company is based in Jhubei City, Taiwan.

6761.TWO.summary: Wendell Industrial Co., Ltd provides circuit protection component in South Korea, Japan, Singapore, and China. Its products are used in mobile phones, desktop computers, notebook computers, tablet computers, digital cameras, navigation systems, surveillance systems, industrial computers, medical equipment, communication equipment, Netcom products, wind power generation system, LED lighting system, and others. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6775.TWO.summary: Entire Technology Co.,Ltd. operates in the optoelectronics material technology industry in Taiwan. The company offers light guide and diffuser plates for various applications, including TV screens, commercial displays, computer monitors, notebooks, tablets, SATNAV, POS terminals, industrial computers, gaming machines, and advertising signs, as well as LED backlight modules car displays, edge-lit LED panels, emergency lights, commercial advertising lights, illumination components, and equipment lightings; composite plates for 5G applications and consumer electronics cases; polycarbonate composites injections for backlight module plastic frames, which are used in electronic, machinery, and automobile industries; and composite materials and optical films for used in smartphones or in-car displays. Entire Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6792.TWO.summary: Unictron Technologies Corp. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of antennas and piezoelectric ceramic elements for use in various electronic devices in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides antennas, such as chip, patch, and custom-made antennas; and piezoelectric ceramic elements, including automobile parking sensors, ultrasonic transducers, weaving machine actuators, and touch panel sensors. It also offers over-voltage and over-current circuit protection components comprising spark gaps, gas tubes, thyristors, transient voltage suppressors, ZnO-based varistors, PPTC resettable fuses, and other fuses. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsin-Chu, Taiwan.

6813.TWO.summary: GeneTouch Corp., Ltd. designs and manufactures touch technology products. The company offers infrared touch, PCAP touch, and digital signage products, as well as wireless presentation solutions and accessories. It also provides electronics manufacturing service FOR OEM/ODM customers. GeneTouch Corp., Ltd. Was founded in 2009 is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6818.TWO.summary: Advanced Wireless & Antenna Inc. manufactures and sells computer and communication connectors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers Wi-Fi, NFC, networking, and 3D antennas; and NFC modules with antennas, as well as Netcom antennas. Its products are used in computer, electronic communication, telecommunications, automotive, medical, and Internet of Things and other related markets. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6821.TWO.summary: LinkCom Manufacturing Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells magnetic components, intelligent power supplies, and intelligent lighting control solutions worldwide. Its products are used in 5G, electric car, IoT, ehealth, network communication, and industrial control applications. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

7419.TWO.summary: Mortech Corporation develops and provides polyimide films in Taiwan. Its products include PIF, PIN, PIB/PMB, PIA/PAB, and PIT type polyimide films. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

7556.TWO.summary: Yeedex Electronic Corporation provides parts, materials, and sub-systems for semiconductor process equipment in Taiwan and China. The company offers fine ceramic parts and materials; perfluoroelastomer seals; precision vacuum chucks; refurbish and repair precious parts, including ESC, heaters, vacuum chucks, ceramic coatings, anodizing products, etc.; plasma coated chamber parts; quartz and others parts; tungsten carbide blades; and heat resistant phosphor plates. It also serves flat display panel, passive electronic component, LED, solar cell, automobile, medical, and special material industries. The company also exports its products to other Asian and American countries. Yeedex Electronic Corporation was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8039.TW.summary: Taiflex Scientific Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, wholesale, and retail of electronic materials and components in Taiwan. The company offers polymer film based copper clad laminates, cover layers, photovoltaic module back sheets, flexible copper-cladded laminates, optical film materials, bonding sheets, composited PI sheets, and PI type stiffeners. It provides electronic materials for applications in cell phones, music players, DSC/DVC, HDD, and tablets; and energy materials for solar powered cell phones, rooftop systems, and vehicles, as well as solar street lamps and utility scale applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8042.TWO.long_name: Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd.
8042.TWO.summary: Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes electrolytic capacitors. The company offers aluminum electrolytic capacitors, such as radial lead type, snap-in lug terminal type, and screw terminal type capacitors; and aluminum polymer capacitors comprising polymer radial lead type and polymer SMD type capacitors. Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8043.TWO.summary: Honey Hope Honesty Enterprise Co.,Ltd operates as a sales agent for electronic passive components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers multilayer capacitors, chip inductors and capacitors, and other products. It serves PC, notebook, TFT-LCD, mobile phones, network equipment, communications equipment, wireless local area network, and information industry peripheral equipment manufacturers. Honey Hope Honesty Enterprise Co.,Ltd was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8046.TW.short_name: NAN YA PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD CO
8046.TW.long_name: Nan Ya Printed Circuit Board Corporation
8046.TW.summary: Nan Ya Printed Circuit Board Corporation manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) and IC substrates in Taiwan. It offers conventional PCBs that are used in the motherboards of desktops and notebooks, and home electrical appliances; high density interconnection PCBs that are used in smartphones, game consoles, GPS, PDAs, automobile appliances, and MP3 players; and rigid-flex PCBs for use in high-end portable devices and notebooks. The company also provides flip chip substrates comprising pin/land grid arrays for microprocessors; and ball grid arrays for graphic microprocessors, northbridge chipsets, high-end ASIC chipsets, and set-top box chipsets. In addition, it offers wire bond substrates for MCP, southbridge chipsets, communication, and networking applications, as well as for use in memory, portable devices, handsets, consumer electronics, and PC peripheral device applications. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Nan Ya Printed Circuit Board Corporation is a subsidiary of Nan Ya Plastics Corporation.

8049.TWO.summary: Ampire Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells liquid crystal display (LCD) modules and touch screens for industrial applications. The company offers large, medium, and small TN, STN, FSTN, TFT, and capacitive TP modules, as well as graphic, character, and open frame products. Its products are used in non-consumer application panels, such as white home appliances, HMI, card reader, industrial instrumentation, medical devices, automobile display panel, touch panel PC/Monitor, maritime information display panel, on-board entertainment panel, smart home control display panel, kiosks, and multi-functional office machines. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8074.TWO.summary: Aurona Industries, Inc. produces phenolic resin laminates of drilling backup boards, and insulating materials to print circuit board and mechanical industries. The company's product portfolio includes PCB drilling back-up/entry boards, routing back-up/entry boards, bakelites, diamond coating routers, medium-density fiberboards, aluminum lubrication entry boards, cushion craft papers, collets, and pressure brushes. It supplies its products to the high-end PCB and IC carrier fabricators, as well as for use in the PCB applications, including smart phone, flash memory chip, PBGA, flip chip drilling, etc. The company supplies its products to approximately 10 countries, such as Japan, Korea, China, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam, Germany, and the United States. Aurona Industries, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8080.TWO.summary: Taiwan Ostor Corporation manufactures and sells electronic components. It offers electrolytic capacitors for use in the motherboard and power supply markets; solid capacitors; and Trusted Platform Module, a microcontroller installed on the motherboard of a PC or laptop designed to provide security-related functions and create cryptographic keys and digital certificates. The company also offers fingerprint solutions, interquip electronics, and multilayer ceramic capacitors. In addition, it provides medical crystal products, such as scintillator. Further, the company offers crystalline solar modules, photovoltaic (PV) ethylene-vinyl-acetate films, PV backsheets, PV module automatic equipment, and PV junction boxes, as well as conductive silver paste. Taiwan Ostor Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8103.TW.summary: CviLux Corporation manufactures and sells connectors, flat flexible cables (FFC), and wire harnesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company's connectors include board to board, CCFL, coaxial, combo D-sub, DVI, FFC/FPC, IEEE, LVDS, memory card, mini-DIN, power, serial ATA, telephone/modular jack, USB, wire to board crimp style, wire to board insulation displacement, and ribbon cable connectors, as well as application tooling and IC sockets. It also offers cable assemblies; PCBA turnkey solutions; LVDS cables; and fiber optics connectors and cables. The company's products are used in consumer electronics, computers, communication, and electro-optical industries. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8104.TW.summary: RiTdisplay Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of organic light-emitting diodes in Taiwan and internationally. It also provides various flat-panel display products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8105.TW.summary: Giantplus Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of thin film transistor liquid crystal displays in China, Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Europe, Japan, the United States, and internationally. The company's products include industrial displays, electronic labels, credit card machines, engineering drawing computers, handheld terminals, medical equipment meters, white goods, wearable devices, satellite navigation systems, automotive displays, game educational machines, anti-peeping screens, printers, and digital cameras. It serves industrial and automotive markets. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Toufen, Taiwan. Ltd. Giantplus Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Toppan Printing Co., Ltd.

8111.TWO.summary: Ligitek Electronics Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells a range of optoelectronic components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers LED products, such as through hole LEDs, PCB type surface-mount device (SMD), PLCC SMDs, leads type SMDs, invisible LED, automotive LED, ambient light sensors, smart LED, arrays, SMD type displays, LED displays, dot matrixes, and LED back lights. Its products are used in the LED lighting, mass transit and MRT system, automobile and motorcycle LED module, customized lighting, imaging lighting infrared module products and ODM, UV module group product and ODM, solar energy, and e-bike applications. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8121.TWO.summary: Acme Electronics Corporation produces and sells soft ferrite products in Taiwan. The company primarily offers Mn-Zn ferrite cores, Ni-Zn ferrite cores, and Mg-Zn ferrite cores for use in telecommunication, power conversion, and interference suppression applications. Its soft ferrite products comprise inductance passive electronic components, such as power transformers, loaded coils, and choke and demagnetization coils, which are used in various 3C devices, including power supplies, desktop monitors, notebooks, broadband network systems, telephone switching systems, relay stations, mobile phones, PDAs, LCD TVs, digital cameras, digital video cameras, video games handsets, scanners, etc. The company also provides sapphire ingots to sapphire wafer customers. Acme Electronics Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8147.TWO.summary: Nextronics Engineering Corp. provides connectors, and PICMG components and solutions for medical, aerospace, transportation, industrial, cloud/communication, and automation applications in Taiwan. The company offers high speed I/O, push pull circular, backplane signal, and combo power connectors; and embedded system connectors and components. It also provides terminal blocks, press-fit machine and tooling products, and customized-solutions, as well as Compact PCI, ATCA, and AMC and Micro TCA product solutions. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8179.TWO.summary: Subtron Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells IC carrier boards and soft boards in Taiwan. Its products primarily include system in package RF, LED lighting, optical communication module, sensor, 5G related, and PBGA/CSP/TFBGA products, as well as TAB, COF, EMV TAB, and INK products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8213.TW.summary: Taiwan Pcb Techvest Co., Ltd., a professional manufacturing service company, manufactures and sells electronic components and printed circuit boards (PCBs). The company offers PCBs for notebooks, servers, memory modules, etc., as well as LCD products. Taiwan Pcb Techvest Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

8215.TW.summary: BenQ Materials Corporation manufactures and sells material science products in Taiwan and internationally. Its product lines includes functional films, including polarizer films; optical films for touch panels; e-paper, a waterproof and surface treatment film for touch panel function; industrial tapes; and smart optical films. The company also provides healthcare products, including hydrocolloid dressings for moist wound management and silicone gel for scar prevention; clinical solution for rapid hemorrhage control of traumatic injury in the pre hospital setting; acne care products; and contact lenses. In addition, it offers separator, a component in liquid electrolyte batteries; and aluminum foil for lithium-ion battery of mobile devices or autos. The company was formerly known as Daxon Technology Inc. and changed its name to BenQ Materials Corporation in June 2010. BenQ Materials Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

8291.TWO.summary: ShineMore Technology Materials Co., Ltd. provides copper clad laminates and carbon and glass fiber composites. It offers FR-4 CCL, prepreg/bonding sheet, and metal CCL products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

AU7A.F.summary: AU Optronics Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and sells thin film transistor liquid crystal displays (TFT-LCDs) and other flat panel displays. The company operates in two segments, Display and Energy. The Display segment designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and markets flat panel displays for use in televisions, monitors, mobile PCs and devices, automobiles, industrial PCs, automated teller machines, point of sale terminals, pachinko machines, medical equipment, etc. This segment serves original equipment manufacturing service providers; and brand companies. The Energy segment manufactures and sells solar materials, including ingots, solar wafers, and solar modules, as well as provides technical engineering and maintenance services for solar system projects. This segment sells its ingot and solar wafer products primarily to solar cell manufacturers; and solar modules to installers, solar system integrators, property developers, and other value-added resellers. The company also sells and leases content management system and hardware; plans, designs, and develops construction for environmental protection and related project management; and manufactures and sells TFT-LCD modules and panels, TV sets, backlight modules, automotive parts, precision plastic parts, and motorized treadmills. In addition, it develops and sells software and hardware for health care industry; provides software and hardware integration system and equipment relating to intelligent manufacturing, as well as related consulting services; and engages in venture capital investment activities. The company operates in the People's Republic of China, Taiwan, Japan, Singapore, and internationally. AU Optronics Corp. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

AUOTY.summary: AU Optronics Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and sells thin film transistor liquid crystal displays (TFT-LCDs) and other flat panel displays. The company operates in two segments, Display and Energy. The Display segment designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and markets flat panel displays for use in televisions, monitors, mobile PCs and devices, automobiles, industrial PCs, automated teller machines, point of sale terminals, pachinko machines, medical equipment, etc. This segment serves original equipment manufacturing service providers; and brand companies. The Energy segment manufactures and sells solar materials, including ingots, solar wafers, and solar modules, as well as provides technical engineering and maintenance services for solar system projects. This segment sells its ingot and solar wafer products primarily to solar cell manufacturers; and solar modules to installers, solar system integrators, property developers, and other value-added resellers. The company also sells and leases content management system and hardware; plans, designs, and develops construction for environmental protection and related project management; and manufactures and sells TFT-LCD modules and panels, TV sets, backlight modules, automotive parts, precision plastic parts, and motorized treadmills. In addition, it develops and sells software and hardware for health care industry; provides software and hardware integration system and equipment relating to intelligent manufacturing, as well as related consulting services; and engages in venture capital investment activities. The company operates in the People's Republic of China, Taiwan, Japan, Singapore, and internationally. AU Optronics Corp. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

FITGF.summary: FIT Hon Teng Limited engages in the design, development, production, and sale of interconnect solutions and related products in Taiwan, People's Republic of China, the United States, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. The company offers cable components, including array of IO cables assemblies, as well as wire harness and power cords. It also provides connector components comprising backplane, high speed, input/output, and power connectors, as well as memory/edge cards, sockets, terminal blocks, and wire to board/board to board connectors; and active optical cables, embedded optical modules, transceiver modules, and acoustic products. In addition, the company offers radio frequency antenna cable and module assemblies; wireless charging products and components; and accessories, such as headsets, speaker systems, and power and cable accessories. It also engages in research, development, and manufacture of batteries; manufacturing of metal processing machinery and equipment; and sale of smart home products. The company offers its products under the e Belkin, Linksys, Wemo, and Phyn brand names. It serves communications infrastructure, computers and consumer electronics, mobile and wireless devices, automotive, and industrial and medical industries. The company was formerly known as New Wing International Holdings Limited and changed its name to FIT Hon Teng Limited in June 2013. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Foxconn FIT Hon Teng Limited is a subsidiary of Foxconn (Far East) Limited.

HHP2.F.long_name: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd.
HHP2.F.summary: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd. provides technology solutions in Japan, Ireland, the United States, Europe, Singapore, China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company manufactures, sells, and services connectors, cases, thermal modules, wired/wireless communication products, optical products, power supply modules, and assemblies for use in the information technology, communications, automotive equipment, precision molding, automobile, and consumer electronics industries. It also manufactures automobile wires/electronic devices and electronic components, as well as machinery and equipment; and provides services of planning, advisory, and business management, as well as software and electronic information application, logistics, export processing, construction, leasing, and information/software services. In addition, the company manufactures and sells application modules and network cables assemblies; develops educational technology; holds patent applications; manufactures and trades in portable cameras; and retails office machinery and equipment, and electronic appliances. Further, it is involved in the reinvestment in the businesses relating to robots, automatic equipment, molds, parts, and accessories and corresponding services; software development, repair and after-sale services, and rental services of robots; leasing services. Additionally, the company manufactures and sells computer and data processing equipment, WIFI cards and modules, CFTVs, DVRs, Bluetooth modules, set-top boxes, and optical network terminals. It is also involved in the data storage; manufacturing of wire or wireless communication; installation of computer and satellite TV channels; and provision of mobile phone services, as well as telecom-related business. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

HNHPF.long_name: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd.
HNHPF.summary: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd. provides technology solutions in Japan, Ireland, the United States, Europe, Singapore, China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company manufactures, sells, and services connectors, cases, thermal modules, wired/wireless communication products, optical products, power supply modules, and assemblies for use in the information technology, communications, automotive equipment, precision molding, automobile, and consumer electronics industries. It also manufactures automobile wires/electronic devices and electronic components, as well as machinery and equipment; and provides services of planning, advisory, and business management, as well as software and electronic information application, logistics, export processing, construction, leasing, and information/software services. In addition, the company manufactures and sells application modules and network cables assemblies; develops educational technology; holds patent applications; manufactures and trades in portable cameras; and retails office machinery and equipment, and electronic appliances. Further, it is involved in the reinvestment in the businesses relating to robots, automatic equipment, molds, parts, and accessories and corresponding services; software development, repair and after-sale services, and rental services of robots; leasing services. Additionally, the company manufactures and sells computer and data processing equipment, WIFI cards and modules, CFTVs, DVRs, Bluetooth modules, set-top boxes, and optical network terminals. It is also involved in the data storage; manufacturing of wire or wireless communication; installation of computer and satellite TV channels; and provision of mobile phone services, as well as telecom-related business. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
